message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal for both of us, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. Considering the value of the product to you, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price that benefits both of us.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10,250. I think this is a fair price that works for both of us.
